title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.4 - Use for private revenue or commercial purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.4 - Use for private revenue or commercial purposes

State Regulations

The use of the reservoir or the improvements thereon for
private revenue or commercial purposes is prohibited, unless as specifically
designated and permitted by the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
